column4: Can you bind a keyboard shortcut to the Right Control key, but not the Left? Within gnome 2.32, on Maverick,
the keys are different (check xev output), so yes, at least with xbindkeys
I've looked at xev, but when you try and bind it into metacty shortcuts, I can't get metacity's interpretor to map to that keycode
I'm not sure if you can do that with metacity, see if you can enter something specific in gconf-editor at application>metacity
